name: Spell Orb
description: When you cast a Psijic Order ability while you are in combat, you generate a spell charge. When you reach 5 spell charges, you launch a spell orb at the closest enemy to you dealing 1124 Magic Damage or 1124 Physical Damage, whichever is higher.  The spell charges must be generated within 10 seconds of each other or all charges will be lost.
coefDescription: When you cast a Psijic Order ability while you are in combat, you generate a spell charge. When you reach 5 spell charges, you launch a spell orb at the closest enemy to you dealing $1 Magic Damage or $2 Physical Damage, whichever is higher.  The spell charges must be generated within 10 seconds of each other or all charges will be lost.
